channel.title: Authors on Stefano Coretta
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Stefano Coretta

item.description: Welcome to the homepage of Stefano Coretta (IPA: [ˈsteˑfano koˈrɛtta]). I am currently a postdoc researcher at the Institut für Phonetik und Sprachverarbeitung at the Ludwig-Maximilians Universität München. I defended my PhD dissertation (University of Manchester) in November 2019 (expected degree award in 2020). My area of research is linguistics with a particular focus in phonetics and phonology—the study of speech sounds and their relation to human Language. Some of the questions my research tries to answer are:
